faqs.b2: The $GOTCAR Token is the utility token of Guardians of the Car, the first-ever car meme project with a mission to revolutionize the global mobility ecosystem.
faqs.b3: Powered by Web3.0-based AI Agent services, GOTCAR aims to create a world where humans no longer experience traffic accidents or feel anxious while driving.
faqs.c1: Why Should You Join the GOTCAR Guardians Now?

faqs.d1: What makes Guardians of the Car so unique?

faqs.d3: We are introducing groundbreaking solutions never seen before, all while striving for zero traffic accidents. Stay tuned for our journey!
faqs.e1: How does AI technology work in Guardians of the Car?
faqs.e2: GOTCAR's AI Agent utilizes the Guardians' data to provide forward collision alerts, notifications for signal violations and wrong-way vehicles, and road hazard analysis based on weather conditions, ensuring the safety of both drivers and pedestrians.
faqs.e3: Furthermore, the AI Agent continuously learns from the Guardians' data, evolving autonomously to provide more precise and valuable services.
faqs.f1: When will Guardians of the Car launch its main features?
faqs.f2: Guardians of the Car services will be launched in phases. Starting in 2025, the project will roll out staking, node services, and G2E as the initial features.
faqs.f3: Following this, more advanced AI-based safety and convenience services will be introduced to the world.
faqs.g1: When do I get my tokens?
faqs.g2: Once the presale ends and the token launches, you can instantly claim your $GOTCAR tokens.
faqs.g3: Simply connect your wallet and click "Claim"‚Äî it's that easy!

faq.title: FAQ
faq.a1: By utilizing open data, GOTCAR builds an AI-based precision vehicle positioning service that provides 99% cost savings compared to existing autonomous or HD map technologies. Our goal is to make such advanced systems accessible to all vehicles and all environments, not limited to specific models or areas.
faq.q2: What is the utility of the $GOTCAR token?
faq.a2: $GOTCAR is used for mobility-related payments such as fueling, parking, charging, and insurance, as well as for G2E (Guardians-to-Earn) rewards, staking, and community incentives within the ecosystem.
faq.q3: How does GOTCAR use AI technology?
faq.a3: The AI Agent analyzes driving behavior, road hazards, and weather conditions in real time, providing lane-level navigation, indoor parking guidance, and accident alerts. It detects and warns drivers about risks that are difficult to see or react to visually.
faq.q4: When can I claim my $GOTCAR tokens?
faq.a4: You can claim your tokens immediately upon the official launch. The token launch and global CEX listings are planned between Q4 2025 and Q1 2026, with the claim period opening on the same schedule.
faq.a5: Staking begins by depositing $GOTCAR through the official website. Rewards vary depending on the amount and duration of your stake.
faq.a6: Drivers contribute their driving data, which the AI analyzes to assess safety and accident risks. Participants are rewarded in tokens based on their contribution to traffic safety ‚Äî making every driver a Guardian of the GOTCAR ecosystem.
faq.q7: What are GOTCAR's future partnership plans?
faq.a7: GOTCAR is pursuing integrations with global automakers such as Toyota, Hyundai, and Tesla, as well as navigation and payment platforms like Google and Apple. Our long-term goal is to deliver AI-powered safety and convenience services directly within real-world vehicle systems.
